subject: Re: Pedals delivery
description_text:
Dear all, 

Is there any update on my order ? 

Best regards, 

Damir.

> On 2 Dec 2025, at 14:44, Damir Tahirović <damirtahirovic1@gmail.com> wrote:
> 
> ﻿
> Dear Sir,
> 
> On Sunday I ordered the Simsonn Plus X pedals and selected economy shipping. Since I had the pedals delivered to my friend’s address in Austria, hoping they would arrive sooner, I would like to know if there is a chance that the pedals will arrive at his place by December 19th? He is coming to Bosnia and Herzegovina then, and it would be ideal if he could bring them to me because I am currently in the process of assembling my first sim racing rig, so I’m hoping I can start using it as soon as possible.
> 
> Thank you in advance for your reply.
> Kind regards, 
> 
> Damir Tahirović.

conversations.body_text: Hi Damir Tahirović,    We apologize, but the pedals are currently out of stock at our German warehouse. They are expected to arrive tomorrow. We will ship them to you once they are restocked.

Hello, 
Is it possible to change the delivery address, so that I can update it and have the order delivered to Bosnia and Herzegovina?
I don’t mind if there are additional charges, whether the delivery cost changes for Bosnia and Herzegovina, as well as any customs or other fees that may apply.

Since my friend, to whose address in Austria I originally ordered the pedals, is coming to Bosnia and Herzegovina on December 20th, I’m worried the package won’t arrive at his address before then, which would further delay the delivery of the pedals to me.

Thank you in advance for your response.

Best regards, 

Damir.


>
Hi Damir Tahirović,  Please provide your order number again.

Hi to all, 

Order #SSN4201 is my order number. 





>
